title: connection error
body: sometimes my league crashes and i cant reconnect because it says that i must check my connection, but i still have internet. i cant reconnect, the only thing i can do is restart my pc but he's very slow. so is it just me or have other people the same problem?

replies.body: I'm not sure how to fix it then. :l Try these [articles](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/categories/200137704) and if they don't help then contact Riot [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190). Good luck.

I have the same problem, for the last 3 days i have been disconnecting from league continuously it seems its completely random. Sometimes i can play a full length game other times i just dc while having internet and 14 ping. When i just alt+f4 and relog in my league client i sometimes get another connection error where i cannot login as it tells me i dont have internet, but everything else works. The only thing that sometimes resets it is the ipconfig /release renew and flushdns but even then i generally are dc for 5-10 mins. I can barely play the game at this point. Riot pls fix whatever the problem is bc my internet is fine the only game that isnt is league
